email_chain.subject: Freight Quote for Iron Ore - PACIFIC STAR
email_chain.body:
Hi Sarah,

Hope you're doing well. We have the PACIFIC STAR (DWT: 145000, LOA: 310m) available for your iron ore shipment from Port Hedland to Qingdao. Cargo size is 85000MT on CIF terms. Starting freight quote is USD 18.50 per MT. Laycan is 15-20 Oct. Let me know your thoughts.

Best regards,
Alex

email_chain.subject: Re: Freight Quote for Iron Ore - PACIFIC STAR
email_chain.body:
Hi Alex,

Thanks for the quote. USD 18.50 seems a bit high. Can you do better? Also, can you confirm the demurrage rate per day?

Cheers,
Sarah

email_chain.subject: Re: Freight Quote for Iron Ore - PACIFIC STAR
email_chain.body:
Hi Sarah,

I can offer USD 18.20 per MT. Demurrage rate is USD 25,000 per day. Let me know if this works for you.

Best,
Alex

email_chain.subject: Re: Freight Quote for Iron Ore - PACIFIC STAR
email_chain.body:
Hi Alex,

USD 18.20 is better. Can we push it to USD 18.00? Also, can we adjust the laycan to 16-21 Oct?

Cheers,
Sarah

email_chain.subject: Re: Freight Quote for Iron Ore - PACIFIC STAR
email_chain.body:
Hi Sarah,

USD 18.00 is possible. Laycan adjusted to 16-21 Oct. Please confirm.

Best,
Alex

email_chain.subject: Re: Freight Quote for Iron Ore - PACIFIC STAR
email_chain.body:
Hi Alex,

Confirmed. Please send the summary of terms.

Cheers,
Sarah

email_chain.subject: Summary of Terms - PACIFIC STAR
email_chain.body:
Hi Sarah,

Here's the summary:
- Vessel: PACIFIC STAR
- Cargo: 85000MT Iron Ore
- Load Port: Port Hedland
- Discharge Port: Qingdao
- Laycan: 16-21 Oct
- Freight: USD 18.00 per MT
- Demurrage: USD 25,000 per day
- Incoterm: CIF

Please confirm.

Best,
Alex
